page.title: 07Highworth's Adults Clubs.
page.content: On Tuesday in the community hut they have a society for old people. They have coffee, chats and lunch. They really enjoy it. They go to other clubs in the area as well, and have Bingo. We questioned people aged 18 to about 95. These were their answers: Clay centre, silver threads,British Legion, swimming, womens institute, luncheons, golf, badminton, Methodists sisterhood, Lions club, tennis and recreation.We found out a lot of information about these clubs. We found more older people went to clubs than the younger people. Although Highworth has many clubs for adults, a lot of people travel into Swindon for clubs and recreation.
